document.full_text: kyle busch and kevin harvick were fined $25,000 apiece and put on probation tuesday by nascar for their actions on pit road at darlington raceway.
document.title: busch, harvick get probation and $25,000 fines
lines_and_colors: kyle busch and kevin harvick were fined $25,000 apiece and put on probation tuesday by nascar for their actions on pit road at darlington raceway.
